text: A small house must depend on its grouping with other houses for its beauty, and for the preservation of light air and the maximum of surrounding open space.
author: Clarence Stein

text: Personality is more important than beauty, but imagination is more important than both of them.
author: Laurette Taylor

text: You can take no credit for beauty at sixteen. But if you are beautiful at sixty, it will be your own soul's doing.
author: Marie Carmichael Stopes

text: And queenly is the state she keeps, In beauty's lofty trust secure.
author: William Allen Butler

text: If beauty isn't genius it usually signals at least a high level of animal cunning.
author: Peter York
